Because tough-as-nails Gracie Hart is the only female Agent at the office, she's chosen to go undercover as the contestant from New Jersey.

movie_title: journey to the center of the earth
soup: joshhutcherson brendanfraser anitabriem ericbrevig Action Adventure Family Fantasy Sci-Fi
overview: An Edinburgh professor and assorted colleagues follow an explorer's trail down an extinct Icelandic volcano to the earth's center.

soup: annehathaway raven-symoné hectorelizondo garrymarshall Comedy Family Romance
overview: Mia Thermopolis is now a college graduate and on her way to Genovia to take up her duties as princess. Her best friend Lilly also joins her for the summer. Mia continues her 'princess lessons'- riding horses side-saddle, archery, and other royal. But her complicated life is turned upside down once again when she not only learns that she is to take the crown as queen earlier than expected...

soup: denzelwashington juliaroberts tonygoldwyn alanj.pakula Crime Drama Mystery Thriller
overview: Two Supreme Court Justices have been assassinated. One lone law student has stumbled upon the truth. An investigative journalist wants her story. Everybody else wants her dead.

soup: bradleywhitford anthonylapaglia bradrenfro joelschumacher Crime Drama Mystery Thriller
overview: A street-wise kid, Mark Sway, sees the suicide of Jerome Clifford, a prominent Louisiana lawyer, whose current client is Barry 'The Blade' Muldano, a Mafia hit-man. Before Jerome shoots himself, he tells Mark where the body of a Senator is buried. Clifford shoots himself and Mark is found at the scene, and both the FBI and the Mafia quickly realize that Mark probably knows more than he says.

soup: morganfreeman noelgugliemi seanhayes robreiner Adventure Comedy Drama
overview: Corporate billionaire Edward Cole and working class mechanic Carter Chambers are worlds apart. At a crossroads in their lives, they share a hospital room and discover they have two things in common: a desire to spend the time they have left doing everything they ever wanted to do and an unrealized need to come to terms with who they are. Together they embark on the road trip of a lifetime, becoming friends along the way and learning to live life to the fullest, with insight and humor.

soup: harrisonford pollywalker patrickbergin phillipnoyce Action Thriller
overview: When CIA Analyst Jack Ryan interferes with an IRA assassination, a renegade faction targets Jack and his family as revenge.

soup: adamscott janefonda elainestritch robertluketic Comedy Romance
overview: Office temp Charlotte Cantilini thinks she's found Mr. Right when she starts dating gorgeous surgeon Dr. Kevin Fields. But there's a problem standing in the way of everlasting bliss: Kevin's overbearing and controlling mother, Viola. Fearing she'll lose her son's affections forever, Viola decides to break up the happy couple by becoming the world's worst mother-in-law.

soup: hughjackman jakegyllenhaal dylanminnette denisvilleneuve Crime Drama Mystery Thriller
overview: When Keller Dover's daughter and her friend go missing, he takes matters into his own hands as the police pursue multiple leads and the pressure mounts. But just how far will this desperate father go to protect his family?

soup: denzelwashington snoopdogg tomberenger antoinefuqua Crime Drama Thriller
overview: On his first day on the job as a narcotics officer, a rookie cop works with a rogue detective who isn't what he appears.

soup: alanrickman enricocolantoni robinsachs deanparisot Adventure Comedy Sci-Fi
overview: The stars of a 1970s sci-fi show - now scraping a living through re-runs and sci-fi conventions - are beamed aboard an alien spacecraft. Believing the cast's heroic on-screen dramas are historical documents of real-life adventures, the band of aliens turn to the ailing celebrities for help in their quest to overcome the oppressive regime in their solar system.

soup: natashalyonne veronicacartwright andyrichter keenenivorywayans Comedy
overview: While the original parodied slasher flicks like Scream, Keenen Ivory Wayans's sequel to Scary Movie takes comedic aim at haunted house movies. A group of students visit a mansion called "Hell House," and murderous high jinks ensue.

soup: billcobbs ericjacobson stevewhitmire jamesbobin Adventure Comedy Family Musical
overview: When Kermit the Frog and the Muppets learn that their beloved theater is slated for demolition, a sympathetic human, Gary, and his puppet roommate, Walter, swoop in to help the gang put on a show and raise the $10 million they need to save the day.

soup: sanaalathan tracilords udokier stephennorrington Action Horror

Blade and his mentor Whistler battle an evil vampire rebel (Deacon Frost) who plans to take over the outdated vampire council, capture Blade and resurrect voracious blood god La Magra.

soup: channingtatum rickgonzalez robertri'chard thomascarter Drama Sport
overview: Based on a true story, in which Richmond High School head basketball coach Ken Carter made headlines in 1999 for benching his undefeated team due to poor academic results.

soup: sydneypollack mattmalloy brucealtman rogermichell Drama Thriller

But on this day, at this time, a minor collision will turn two complete strangers into vicious adversaries. Their means of destroying each other might be different, but their goals, ultimately, will be the same: Each will systematically try to dismantle the other's life in a reckless effort to reclaim something he has lost.

soup: frankwelker ericstoltz kariwuhrer luisllosa Action Adventure Horror Thriller

soup: adamgarcia tyrabanks izabellamiko davidmcnally Comedy Drama Music Romance

The "Coyotes" as they are affectionately called tantalize customers and the media alike with their outrageous antics, making Coyote Ugly the watering hole for guys on the prowl.

soup: colinfirth liamneeson krismarshall richardcurtis Comedy Drama Romance
overview: Follows seemingly unrelated people as their lives begin to intertwine while they fall in – and out – of love. Affections languish and develop as Christmas draws near.

soup: kevinspacey madelinekahn johnratzenberger johnlasseter Adventure Animation Comedy Family Fantasy
overview: On behalf of "oppressed bugs everywhere," an inventive ant named Flik hires a troupe of warrior bugs to defend his bustling colony from a horde of freeloading grasshoppers led by the evil-minded Hopper.

soup: sylvesterstallone rodsteiger emilioestefanjr. luisllosa Action Crime Drama Romance Thriller
overview: May Munro is a woman obsessed with getting revenge on the people who murdered her parents when she was still a girl. She hires Ray Quick, a retired explosives expert to kill her parent's killers. When Ned Trent, embittered ex-partner of Quick's is assigned to protect one of Quick's potential victims, a deadly game of cat and mouse ensues.

soup: donjohnson cheechmarin renerusso ronshelton Comedy Drama Romance Sport
overview: A washed up golf pro working at a driving range tries to qualify for the US Open in order to win the heart of his succesful rival's girlfriend.

soup: lucilleball tombosley timmatheson melvilleshavelson Comedy Family
overview: When a widower with 10 children marries a widow with 8, can the 20 of them ever come together as one big happy family?

soup: joshhutcherson willferrell robertduvall jessedylan Comedy Family Romance Sport
overview: Phil Weston has been unathletic his entire life. In college he failed at every sport that he tried out for. It looks like his 10-year old son, Sam, is following in his footsteps. But with becoming the coach of The Soccers, an already successful soccer team, everything changes.

movie_title: the hitchhiker's guide to the galaxy
soup: zooeydeschanel kellymacdonald thomaslennon garthjennings Adventure Comedy Sci-Fi
overview: Mere seconds before the Earth is to be demolished by an alien construction crew, Arthur Dent is swept off the planet by his friend Ford Prefect, a researcher penning a new edition of "The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy."

soup: daniaramirez nickzano alicegreczyn joelzwick Comedy Family Fantasy Romance
overview: An obese boy named Fat Albert and his friends Rudy, Mushmouth, Bill, Dumb Donald, Russell, and Weird Harold, pulls into trouble when they "fall" out of their TV world into the real world, where Fat Albert tries to help a young girl, Doris, make friends.

soup: millajovovich mikeepps jamestumminia russellmulcahy Action Horror Sci-Fi Thriller
overview: Years after the Racoon City catastrophe, survivors travel across the Nevada desert, hoping to make it to Alaska. Alice joins the caravan and their fight against hordes of zombies and the evil Umbrella Corp.

soup: bellathorne adamsandler joelmchale frankcoraci Comedy Romance
overview: After a bad blind date, a man and woman find themselves stuck together at a resort for families, where their attractions grows as their respective kids benefit from the burgeoning relationship.

soup: llcoolj aliciawitt timothyhutton waynewang Adventure Comedy Drama
overview: After she's diagnosed with a terminal illness, a shy woman decides to take a European vacation.

soup: merylstreep glennmorshower williamlucking curtishanson Action Adventure Crime Thriller
overview: While on a family vacation,  rafting expert Gail takes on a pair of armed killers while navigating a spectacularly violent river.

soup: stevecoogan vincentkartheiser davidkeith frankoz Drama Family Fantasy
overview: A nine-year-old boy gets a plastic Indian and a cupboard for his birthday and finds himself involved in adventure when the Indian comes to life and befriends him.

soup: demiánbichir sheawhigham garystretch oliverstone Crime Drama Thriller
overview: A tribe of primitive "mudpeople" encounter a croquet ball, rolling through their forest. Following it, they find themselves on a vast, deserted Long Island estate. Entering, they begin to become civilized and assume the stereotypical roles and dress of people at a weekend party. There follows an allegory of upper-class behavior. At last, they begin to devolve toward their original status, and after a battle at croquet, they disappear into the woods.

soup: richardburgi valeriecruz willbeinbrink davidr.ellis Action Crime Thriller
overview: A young man receives an emergency phone call on his cell phone from an older woman. She claims to have been kidnapped – and the kidnappers have targeted her husband and child next.

soup: kevinmcnally natalieimbruglia benmiller peterhowitt Action Adventure Comedy
overview: Rowan plays the eponymous lead character in a spoof spy thriller. During the course of the story we follow our hero as he attempts to single-handedly save the country from falling into the hands of a despot.

soup: nicolascage merylstreep juliaroberts johna.davis Adventure Animation Comedy Family Fantasy
overview: Fed up with being targeted by the neighborhood bully, 10-year-old Lucas Nickle vents his frustrations on the anthill in his front yard ... until the insects shrink him to the size of a bug with a magic elixir. Convicted of "crimes against the colony," Lucas can only regain his freedom by living with the ants and learning their ways.

soup: virginiamadsen jürgenprochnow joséferrer davidlynch Action Adventure Sci-Fi
overview: In the year 10,191, the world is at war for control of the desert planet Dune – the only place where the time-travel substance 'Spice' can be found. But when one leader gives up control, it's only so he can stage a coup with some unsavory characters.

soup: leonardodicaprio katewinslet joekomara sammendes Drama Romance
overview: A young couple living in a Connecticut suburb during the mid-1950s struggle to come to terms with their personal problems while trying to raise their two children. Based on a novel by Richard Yates.

soup: brucewillis davidzayas sasharoiz richarddonner Action Crime Drama Thriller
overview: An aging cop is assigned the ordinary task of escorting a fast-talking witness from police custody to a courthouse, but they find themselves running the gauntlet as other forces try to prevent them from getting there.

soup: vindiesel charlotterampling davidbelle mathieukassovitz Action Adventure Sci-Fi Thriller

soup: alexapenavega bobgunton keenenivorywayans johngray Action Comedy Crime Drama Thriller
overview: A former government operative renowned for his stealth, Jack Cole is now a Los Angeles police detective. When a series of horrible murders occurs in the metro area, Cole is assigned to the case, along with tough-talking fellow cop Jim Campbell. Although the two men clash, they gradually become effective partners as they uncover a conspiracy linked to the killings, which also involves terrorism and organized crime.

soup: johndelancie briandoyle-murray obbababatundé haroldramis Comedy Romance Sci-Fi
overview: Construction worker Doug Kinney finds that the pressures of his working life, combined with his duties to his wife Laura and daughter Jennifer leaves him with little time for himself. However, he is approached by geneticist Dr. Owen Leeds, who offers Doug a rather unusual solution to his problems: cloning.

soup: malesejow carterjenkins timmeadows johnschultz Adventure Comedy Family Fantasy Sci-Fi
overview: It's summer vacation, but the Pearson family kids are stuck at a boring lake house with their nerdy parents. Using only their wits, courage and video game-playing skills, the youngsters must band together to defeat the aliens and save the world - but the toughest part might be keeping the whole thing a secret from their parents! Featuring an all-star cast including Ashley Tisdale, Andy Richter, Kevin Nealon, Tim Meadows and Doris Roberts, Aliens In The Attic is the most fun you can have on this planet!

soup: costasmandylor adriendorval nelslennarson seanpenn Crime Drama Mystery Thriller
overview: A police chief about to retire pledges to help a woman find her daughter's killer. Based on a story by Swiss writer Friedrich Dürrenmatt.

soup: jonlovitz willferrell matthewbroderick susanstroman Comedy Musical

soup: woodharris jasoncope rakieayola petetravis Action Sci-Fi
overview: In the future, America is a dystopian wasteland. The latest scourge is Ma-Ma, a prostitute-turned-drug pusher with a dangerous new drug and aims to take over the city. The only possibility of stopping her is an elite group of urban police called Judges, who combine the duties of judge, jury and executioner to deliver a brutal brand of swift justice. But even the top-ranking Judge, Dredd, discovers that taking down Ma-Ma isn’t as easy as it seems in this explosive adaptation of the hugely popular comic series.

soup: cary-hiroyukitagawa treatwilliams kristyswanson simonwincer Action Adventure Comedy Fantasy
overview: The 21st successor to the role of Bengalla's resident superhero must travel to New York to prevent a rich madman from obtaining three magic skulls that would give him the secret to ultimate power.

soup: mattdamon henrythomas samshepard billybobthornton Drama Romance Western
overview: The year is 1949. A young Texan named John Grady finds himself without a home after his mother sells the ranch where he has spent his entire life. Lured south of the border by the romance of cowboy life and the promise of a fresh start, Cole and his pal embark on an adventure that will test their resilience, define their maturity, and change their lives forever.

soup: anthonyhopkins bobhoskins joanallen oliverstone Biography Drama History
overview: An all-star cast powers this epic look at American President Richard M. Nixon, a man carrying the fate of the world on his shoulders while battling the self-destructive demands within. Spanning his troubled boyhood in California to the shocking Watergate scandal that would end his presidency.

soup: jimbelushi oliviawilliams timothyhutton romanpolanski Mystery Thriller
overview: A writer stumbles upon a long-hidden secret when he agrees to help former British Prime Minister Adam Lang complete his memoirs on a remote island after the politician's assistant drowns in a mysterious accident. In director Roman Polanski's tense drama, the author realizes that his discovery threatens some very powerful people who will do anything to ensure that certain episodes from Lang's past remain buried.

soup: djimonhounsou jasonflemyng wesstudi stephensommers Action Adventure Horror Sci-Fi
overview: A group of heavily armed hijackers board a luxury ocean liner in the South Pacific Ocean to loot it, only to do battle with a series of large-sized, tentacled, man-eating sea creatures who have taken over the ship first.

soup: josephgordon-levitt omarihardwick lazalonso spikelee Action Crime Drama Thriller War
overview: Miracle at St. Anna chronicles the story of four American soldiers who are members of the all-black 92nd "Buffalo Soldier" Division stationed in Tuscany, Italy during World War II.

soup: ligong yeliu manli yimouzhang Drama Romance
overview: During China's Tang dynasty the emperor has taken the princess of a neighboring province as wife. She has borne him two sons and raised his eldest. Now his control over his dominion is complete, including the royal family itself.

soup: nicolascage charlieyeung jameswith dannypang Action Crime Thriller
overview: The movie is about a deaf-mute hitman and his partner. Trouble begins when he starts a relationship with a young woman.

soup: zooeydeschanel janeanegarofalo omarepps barrysonnenfeld Comedy Crime Thriller
overview: The story of how a mysterious suitcase brings together, and changes, the lives of a divorced dad, an unhappy housewife, two hitmen, a pair of street thugs, two love struck teens, two FBI men and a psychedelic toad. Based on Pulitzer Prize-winning humorist Dave Barry's best-selling first novel, "Big Trouble."

movie_title: love in the time of cholera
soup: marcelamar giovannamezzogiorno unaxugalde mikenewell Drama Romance
overview: In Colombia just after the Great War, an old man falls from a ladder; dying, he professes great love for his wife. After the funeral, a man calls on the widow - she dismisses him angrily. Flash back more than 50 years to the day Florentino Ariza, a telegraph boy, falls in love with Fermina Daza, the daughter of a mule trader.

soup: samwaterston bengazzara nicholasturturro georgep.cosmatos Action Thriller
overview: Bobby Bishop (Sheen) is a special assistant to the President of the United States. Accidentally, he meets his friend professor Pochenko on the street. Pochenko has time to tell Bishop about some conspiracy in the White House but then immediately gets killed by an assassin. Now bad guys are after Bobby as the only man who knows about a plot. Bishop must now not only survive, but to stop the conspirators from achieving their goal. And he doesn't know whom to trust.

soup: danielkaluuya timmcinnerny togoigawa oliverparker Action Adventure Comedy Crime
overview: The most prominent heads of state in the world begin gathering for a conference that could have a major impact on global politics. When MI-7 receives word that the Chinese premier has become the target of some high-powered killers, it falls on Johnny English to save the day. Armed with the latest high-tech weaponry and gadgets that would make even James Bond jealous, the once-disgraced agent uncovers evidence of a massive conspiracy involving some of the world's most powerful organisations, and vows to redeem his tarnished reputation by stopping the killers before they can strike.

soup: jerrystiller larrymiller harveyfierstein lawrencekasanoff Action Animation Comedy Family Fantasy
overview: Dex, a superdog sleuth, is the law of the land when the world's most recognized brands take on the forces of evil and the devilish Brand X.

soup: cleaduvall scootmcnairy tatedonovan benaffleck Biography Drama History Thriller
overview: As the Iranian revolution reaches a boiling point, a CIA 'exfiltration' specialist concocts a risky plan to free six Americans who have found shelter at the home of the Canadian ambassador.

genres: Action Adventure Crime Drama Mystery Thriller
soup: harrisonford danielroebuck selaward andrewdavis Action Adventure Crime Drama Mystery Thriller
overview: Wrongfully accused of murdering his wife, Richard Kimble escapes from the law in an attempt to find her killer and clear his name. Pursuing him is a team of U.S. marshals led by Deputy Samuel Gerard, a determined detective who will not rest until Richard is captured. As Richard leads the team through a series of intricate chases, he discovers the secrets behind his wife's death and struggles to expose the killer before it is too late.

soup: gerardbutler dorianmissick petergreene andytennant Action Comedy Romance
overview: Milo Boyd is a bounty hunter whose latest gig is rather satisfying, as he finds out that the bail-skipper he must chase down is his own ex-wife, Nicole -- but she has no intention of getting nabbed without a fight. Complicating matters, Nicole's wannabe-boyfriend, Stewart, joins the chase.

soup: robertdeniro bradpitt minniedriver barrylevinson Crime Drama Thriller
overview: Two gangsters seek revenge on the state jail worker who during their stay at a youth prison sexually abused them. A sensational court hearing takes place to charge him for the crimes. A moving drama from director Barry Levinson.

soup: sylvesterstallone julianickson martinkove georgep.cosmatos Action Adventure Thriller War
overview: John Rambo is released from prison by the government for a top-secret covert mission to the last place on Earth he'd want to return - the jungles of Vietnam.

soup: josephgordon-levitt demimoore anneheche briangibson Drama Thriller
overview: With his gangster boss on trial for murder, a mob thug known as "the Teacher" tells Annie Laird she must talk her fellow jurors into a not-guilty verdict, implying that he'll kill her son Oliver if she fails. She manages to do this, but, when it becomes clear that the mobsters might want to silence her for good, she sends Oliver abroad and tries to gather evidence of the plot against her, setting up a final showdown.

soup: melblanc dickiejones cliffedwards normanferguson Animation Family Fantasy Musical
overview: Lonely toymaker Geppetto has his wishes answered when the Blue Fairy arrives to bring his wooden puppet Pinocchio to life. Before becoming a real boy, however, Pinocchio must prove he's worthy as he sets off on an adventure with his whistling sidekick and conscience, Jiminy Cricket. From Stromboli's circus to Pleasure Island, Pinocchio is tested by many temptations, but slowly learns how to navigate right from wrong. With a few mishaps along the way, Geppetto's "little woodenhead" finally gets it right, proving that when you wish upon a star dreams really can come true!

soup: jeffbridges samwaterston isabellehuppert michaelcimino Adventure Drama Western
overview: Harvard graduate James Averill (Kris Kristofferson) is the sheriff of prosperous Jackson County, Wyo., when a battle erupts between the area's poverty-stricken immigrants and its wealthy cattle farmers. The politically connected ranch owners fight the immigrants with the help of Nathan Champion (Christopher Walken), a mercenary competing with Averill for the love of local madam Ella Watson (Isabelle Huppert). As the struggle escalates, Averill and Champion begin to question their decisions.

soup: sophiamyles tonycurran derekjacobi lenwiseman Action Adventure Fantasy Sci-Fi Thriller
overview: As the war between the vampires and the Lycans rages on, Selene, a former member of the Death Dealers (an elite vampire special forces unit that hunts werewolves), and Michael, the werewolf hybrid, work together in an effort to unlock the secrets of their respective bloodlines.

soup: f.murrayabraham robbrown michaelnouri gusvansant Drama
overview: Gus van Sant tells the story of a young African American man named Jamal who confronts his talents while living on the streets of the Bronx. He accidentally runs into an old writer named Forrester who discovers his passion for writing. With help from his new mentor Jamal receives a scholarship to a private school.

soup: stevebuscemi viggomortensen elizabethperkins bettythomas Comedy Drama
overview: After getting into a car accident while drunk on the day of her sister's wedding, Gwen Cummings is given a choice between prison or a rehab center. She chooses rehab, but is extremely resistant to taking part in any of the treatment programs they have to offer, refusing to admit that she has an alcohol addiction.

soup: morganfreeman jetli bobhoskins louisleterrier Action Crime Drama Thriller
overview: Raised as a slave, Danny is used to fighting for his survival. In fact, his "master," Bart, thinks of him as a pet and goes as far as leashing him with a collar so they can make money in fight clubs, where Danny is the main contender. When Bart's crew is in a car accident, Danny escapes and meets a blind, kindhearted piano tuner who takes him in and uses music to free the fighter's long-buried heart.

soup: judithchapman lillianadams chelseabond rogerkumble Comedy Romance
overview: Christina's love life is stuck in neutral. After years of avoiding the hazards of a meaningful relationship, one night while club-hopping with her girlfriends, she meets Peter, her perfect match. Fed up with playing games, she finally gets the courage to let her guard down and follow her heart, only to discover that Peter has suddenly left town. Accompanied by Courtney, she sets out to capture the one that got away.

soup: tomcruise hollyhunter wilfordbrimley sydneypollack Drama Mystery Thriller
overview: Mitch McDeere is a young man with a promising future in Law. About to sit his Bar exam, he is approached by 'The Firm' and made an offer he doesn't refuse. Seduced by the money and gifts showered on him, he is totally oblivious to the more sinister side of his company. Then, two Associates are murdered. The FBI contact him, asking him for information and suddenly his life is ruined. He has a choice - work with the FBI, or stay with the Firm. Either way he will lose his life as he knows it. Mitch figures the only way out is to follow his own plan...

soup: augustusprew charlietahan valerietian burrsteers Drama Fantasy Romance
overview: Accomplished sailor Charlie St. Cloud has the adoration of his mother Claire and his little brother Sam, as well as a college scholarship that will lead him far from his sleepy Pacific Northwest hometown. But his bright future is cut short when a tragedy strikes and takes his dreams with it. After his high-school classmate Tess returns home unexpectedly, Charlie grows torn between honoring a promise he made four years earlier and moving forward with newfound love. And as he finds the courage to let go of the past for good, Charlie discovers the soul most worth saving is his own.

soup: jasonstatham tonygoldwyn minianden simonwest Action Crime Thriller
overview: Arthur Bishop is a veteran hit man who, owing to his penchant for making his targets' deaths seem like accidents, thinks himself an artist. It's made him very rich, but as he hits middle age, he's so depressed and lonely that he takes on one of his victim's sons, Steve McKenna, as his apprentice. Arthur puts him through a rigorous training period and brings him on several hits. As Steven improves, Arthur worries that he'll discover who killed his father.

soup: channingtatum daxflame robriggle phillord Action Comedy Crime
overview: In high school, Schmidt was a dork and Jenko was the popular jock. After graduation, both of them joined the police force and ended up as partners riding bicycles in the city park. Since they are young and look like high school students, they are assigned to an undercover unit to infiltrate a drug ring that is supplying high school students synthetic drugs.

soup: juliaroberts clarkepeters dylanmoran rogermichell Comedy Drama Romance
overview: The British comedy from director Roger Michell tells the love story between a famous actress and a simple book seller from London. A look into the attempt for famous people to have a personal and private life and the ramifications that follow. Nominated for three Golden Globes in 2000.

soup: imeldastaunton mirandarichardson juliasawalha peterlord Adventure Animation Comedy Drama Family
overview: Having been hopelessly repressed and facing eventual certain death at the British chicken farm where they are held, Rocky the american rooster and Ginger the chicken decide to rebel against the evil Mr. and Mrs. Tweedy, the farm's owners. Rocky and Ginger lead their fellow chickens in a great escape from the murderous farmers and their farm of doom.

soup: philipseymourhoffman masioka debramessing johnhamburg Comedy Romance
overview: Reuben Feffer is a guy who's spent his entire life playing it safe. Polly Prince is irresistible as a free-spirit who lives for the thrill of the moment. When these two comically mismatched souls collide, Reuben's world is turned upside down, as he makes an uproarious attempt to change his life from middle-of-the-road to totally-out-there.

soup: johnwitherspoon earthakitt geoffreyholder reginaldhudlin Comedy Drama Romance
overview: Marcus is a successful advertising executive who woos and beds women almost at will. After a company merger he finds that his new boss, the ravishing Jacqueline, is treating him in exactly the same way. Completely traumatised by this, his work goes badly downhill.

soup: michaelrapaport williamxifaras demiánbichir paulfeig Action Comedy Crime
overview: Uptight and straight-laced, FBI Special Agent Sarah Ashburn is a methodical investigator with a reputation for excellence--and hyper-arrogance. Shannon Mullins, one of Boston P.D.'s "finest," is foul-mouthed and has a very short fuse, and uses her gut instinct and street smarts to catch the most elusive criminals. Neither has ever had a partner, or a friend for that matter. When these two wildly incompatible law officers join forces to bring down a ruthless drug lord, they become the last thing anyone expected: Buddies.

soup: martinlandau richardburton roddymcdowall josephl.mankiewicz Biography Drama History Romance
overview: Historical epic. The triumphs and tragedy of the Egyptian queen, Cleopatra.The winner of four Oscars, this epic saga of love, greed and betrayal stars Elizabeth Taylor as the passionate and ambitious Egyptian queen who's determined to hold on to the throne and seduces the Roman emperor Julius Caesar (Rex Harrison). When Caesar is murdered, she redirects her attentions to his general, Marc Antony (Richard Burton), who vows to take power -- but Caesar's successor (Roddy McDowall) has other plans.

soup: salmahayek reggielee charice frankcoraci Action Comedy Sport
overview: A high school biology teacher moonlights as a mixed-martial arts fighter in an effort to raise money to save the school's music program.

soup: morganfreeman adamscott brucedavison carlfranklin Crime Drama Mystery Thriller
overview: High powered lawyer Claire Kubik finds her world turned upside down when her husband, who she thought was Tom Kubik, is arrested and is revealed to be Ron Chapman. Chapman is on trial for a murder of Latin American villagers while he was in the Marines. Claire soon learns that to navigate the military justice system, she'll need help from the somewhat unconventional Charlie Grimes.

soup: jeffbridges austinpendleton mimirogers barbrastreisand Comedy Drama Romance
overview: Rose Morgan (Barbara Streisand), who still lives with her mother (Lauren Bacall), is a professor of Romantic Literature who desperately longs for passion in her life. Gregory Larkin (Jeff Bridges), a mathematics professor, has been burned by passionate relationships and longs for a sexless union based on friendship and respect.

soup: debramessing willpatton davideigenberg markpellington Drama Horror Mystery Thriller
overview: Reporter John Klein is plunged into a world of impossible terror and unthinkable chaos when fate draws him to a sleepy West Virginia town whose residents are being visited by a great winged shape that sows hideous nightmares and fevered visions.

soup: bono eltonjohn slash larrycharles Comedy
overview: Flamboyantly gay Austrian television reporter Bruno stirs up trouble with unsuspecting guests and large crowds through brutally frank interviews and painfully hilarious public displays of homosexuality.

soup: robertdavi talisasoto anthonyzerbe johnglen Action Adventure Thriller
overview: James Bond and his American colleague Felix Leiter arrest the drug lord Sanchez who succeeds in escaping and takes revenge on Felix and his wife. Bond knows but just one thing: revenge.

soup: garyoldman billyburke virginiamadsen catherinehardwicke Fantasy Horror Mystery Thriller
overview: Valerie is in love with a brooding outsider, Peter, but her parents have arranged for her to marry another man – who is wealthy. Unwilling to lose each other, Valerie and Peter plan to run away together when they learn that Valerie's older sister has been killed by a werewolf that prowls the dark forest surrounding their village. Hungry for revenge, the people call on famed werewolf hunter, Father Solomon, to help them kill the wolf. But Solomon's arrival brings unintended consequences as he warns that the wolf, who takes human form by day, could be any one of them.

soup: robertdeniro charlizetheron kelseygrammer johnherzfeld Action Crime Drama Thriller
overview: When Eastern European criminals Oleg and Emil come to New York City to pick up their share of a heist score, Oleg steals a video camera and starts filming their activities, both legal and illegal. When they learn how the American media circus can make a remorseless killer look like the victim and make them rich, they target media-savvy NYPD Homicide Detective Eddie Flemming and media-naive FDNY Fire Marshal Jordy Warsaw, the cops investigating their murder and torching of their former criminal partner, filming everything to sell to the local tabloid TV show "Top Story."

soup: bobhoskins fisherstevens fionashaw annabeljankel Adventure Comedy Family Fantasy Sci-Fi
overview: Mario and Luigi, plumbers from Brooklyn, find themselves in an alternate universe where evolved dinosaurs live in hi-tech squalor. They're the only hope to save our universe from invasion by the dino dictator, Koopa.

soup: nicolascage jeremycrutchley jaredburke andrewniccol Crime Drama Thriller
overview: Yuri Orlov is a globetrotting arms dealer and, through some of the deadliest war zones, he struggles to stay one step ahead of a relentless Interpol agent, his business rivals and even some of his customers who include many of the world's most notorious dictators. Finally, he must also face his own conscience.

soup: fisherstevens debbiereynolds patrickfischler julieannerobinson Action Comedy Crime Romance Thriller
overview: An unemployed lingerie buyer convinces her bail bondsman cousin to give her a shot as a bounty hunter. Her first assignment is to track down a former cop on the run for murder – the same man who broke her heart years before. With the help of some friends and the best bounty hunter in the business, she slowly learns what it takes to be a true bounty hunter.

soup: jamesfranco randallpark andersholm evangoldberg Comedy
overview: A duel between a suspected murderer and a detective pressed by people who want results. But whose skin is really wanted.

soup: tonycox dong-gunjang jedbrophy sngmoolee Action Fantasy Western
overview: An Asian assassin (Dong-gun Jang) is forced to hide in a small town in the American Badlands. Also starring Kate Bosworth, Danny Huston, Tony Cox and Academy Award winner Geoffrey Rush.

soup: omarsy danyboon andrédussollier jean-pierrejeunet Action Comedy Crime
overview: A man and his friends come up with an intricate and original plan to destroy two big weapons manufacturers.  Avid movie-watcher and video store clerk Bazil has had his life all but ruined by weapons of war. His father was killed by a landmine in Morocco and one fateful night a stray bullet from a nearby shootout embeds itself in his skull, leaving him on the verge of instantaneous death. Losing his job and his home, Bazil wanders the streets until he meets Slammer, a pardoned convict who introduces him to a band of eccentric junkyard dealers including Calculator, a math expert and statistician, Buster, a record-holder in human cannonball feats, Tiny Pete, an artistic craftsman of automatons, and Elastic Girl, a sassy contortionist. When chance reveals to Bazil the two weapons manufacturers responsible for building the instruments of his destruction, he constructs a complex scheme for revenge that his newfound family is all too happy to help set in motion.

soup: mekhiphifer omarbensonmiller evanjones curtishanson Drama Music
overview: The setting is Detroit in 1995. The city is divided by 8 Mile, a road that splits the town in half along racial lines. A young white rapper, Jimmy "B-Rabbit" Smith Jr. summons strength within himself to cross over these arbitrary boundaries to fulfill his dream of success in hip hop. With his pal Future and the three one third in place, all he has to do is not choke.

soup: heathledger rufussewell bérénicebejo brianhelgeland Action Adventure Romance
overview: William Thatcher, a peasant, is sent to apprentice with a Knight named Hector as a young boy. Urged by his father to "change his Stars", he assumes Sir Hector's place in a tournament when Hector dies in the middle of it. He wins. With the other apprentices, he trains and assumes the title of Sir Ulrich von Lichtenstein.

soup: juliansands leeevans anthonychau-sangwong gordonchan Action Comedy Fantasy
overview: A Hong Kong detective suffers a fatal accident involving a mysterious medallion and is transformed into an immortal warrior with superhuman powers.

soup: brucewillis haleyjoelosment oliviawilliams m.nightshyamalan Drama Mystery Thriller
overview: A psychological thriller about an eight year old boy named Cole Sear who believes he can see into the world of the dead. A child psychologist named Malcolm Crowe comes to Cole to help him deal with his problem, learning that he really can see ghosts of dead people.

soup: robertclohessy mandygonzalez j.smith-cameron asgerleth Action Crime Thriller
overview: An ex-cop turned con threatens to jump to his death from a Manhattan hotel rooftop. The NYPD dispatch a female police psychologist to talk him down. However, unbeknownst to the police on the scene, the suicide attempt is a cover for the biggest diamond heist ever pulled.

soup: joelmchale kevinpollak jobethwilliams davidfrankel Comedy
overview: Three fanatical bird-watchers spend an entire year competing to spot the highest number of species as El Nino sends an extraordinary variety of rare breeds flying up into the U.S., but they quickly discover that there are more important things than coming out on top of the competition

soup: jenniferlawrence christianbale bradleycooper davido.russell Crime Drama
overview: A con man, Irving Rosenfeld, along with his seductive partner Sydney Prosser, is forced to work for a wild FBI agent, Richie DiMaso, who pushes them into a world of Jersey powerbrokers and mafia.

soup: ryanreynolds deniso'hare craigt.nelson annefletcher Comedy Drama Romance
overview: When she learns she's in danger of losing her visa status and being deported, overbearing book editor Margaret Tate forces her put-upon assistant, Andrew Paxton, to marry her.

soup: brucegreenwood annabethgish brucecampbell bruceberesford Crime Mystery Thriller
overview: A woman framed for her husband's murder suspects he is still alive; as she has already been tried for the crime, she can't be re-prosecuted if she finds and kills him.

movie_title: back to the future part ii
soup: leathompson jeffreyweissman thomasf.wilson robertzemeckis Adventure Comedy Sci-Fi
overview: Marty and Doc are at it again in this wacky sequel to the 1985 blockbuster as the time-traveling duo head to 2015 to nip some McFly family woes in the bud. But things go awry thanks to bully Biff Tannen and a pesky sports almanac. In a last-ditch attempt to set things straight, Marty finds himself bound for 1955 and face to face with his teenage parents -- again.

soup: scarlettjohansson morganfreeman amrwaked lucbesson Action Sci-Fi Thriller
overview: MOW about the life of Lucille Ball, focusing on the loving yet tumultuous relationship with Desi Arnaz.

soup: jenniferehle lukegrimes callumrennie samtaylor-johnson Drama Romance
overview: When college senior Anastasia Steele steps in for her sick roommate to interview prominent businessman Christian Grey for their campus paper, little does she realize the path her life will take. Christian, as enigmatic as he is rich and powerful, finds himself strangely drawn to Ana, and she to him. Though sexually inexperienced, Ana plunges headlong into an affair -- and learns that Christian's true sexual proclivities push the boundaries of pain and pleasure.

soup: sylvesterstallone salmahayek alexapenavega robertrodriguez Action Adventure Comedy Family Sci-Fi
overview: Carmen's caught in a virtual reality game designed by the Kids' new nemesis, the Toymaker. It's up to Juni to save his sister, and ultimately the world.

soup: kevinspacey matthewmcconaughey oliverplatt joelschumacher Crime Drama Thriller
overview: A young lawyer defends a black man accused of murdering two men who raped his 10-year-old daughter, sparking a rebirth of the KKK.

soup: tomwelling alysonstoner bonniehunt shawnlevy Comedy Family
overview: The Baker brood moves to Chicago after patriarch Tom gets a job coaching football at Northwestern University, forcing his writer wife, Mary, and the couple's 12 children to make a major adjustment. The transition works well until work demands pull the parents away from home, leaving the kids bored -- and increasingly mischievous.

soup: jerryferrara scottelrod danbilzerian peterberg Action Biography Drama Thriller War
overview: Based on the failed June 28, 2005 mission "Operation Red Wing." Four members of SEAL Team 10, were tasked with the mission to capture or kill notorious Taliban leader, Ahmad Shah. Only one member of the team survived.

soup: tomhanks loripetty rosieo'donnell pennymarshall Comedy Drama Sport
overview: Small-town sisters Dottie and Kit join an all-female baseball league formed after World War II brings pro baseball to a standstill. When their team hits the road with its drunken coach, the siblings find troubles and triumphs on and off the field.

soup: javierbotet franceso'connor robinatkindownes jameswan Horror Mystery Thriller
overview: Lorraine and Ed Warren travel to north London to help a single mother raising four children alone in a house plagued by malicious spirits.

soup: andrewgarfield dustinfitzsimons marcellalentz-pope davidfincher Biography Drama
overview: On a fall night in 2003, Harvard undergrad and computer programming genius Mark Zuckerberg sits down at his computer and heatedly begins working on a new idea. In a fury of blogging and programming, what begins in his dorm room as a small site among friends soon becomes a global social network and a revolution in communication. A mere six years and 500 million friends later, Mark Zuckerberg is the youngest billionaire in history... but for this entrepreneur, success leads to both personal and legal complications.

movie_title: he's just not that into you
soup: carmenperez sabrinarevelle sachikoishida kenkwapis Comedy Drama Romance
overview: Remember that really cute guy who said he'd call – and didn't? Maybe he lost your number. Maybe he's in the hospital. Maybe he's awed by your beauty, brains or success. Or maybe... he's just not that into you.

soup: beaumirchoff carmenelectra reginahall davidzucker Comedy
overview: Cindy finds out the house she lives in is haunted by a little boy and goes on a quest to find out who killed him and why. Also, Alien "Tr-iPods" are invading the world and she has to uncover the secret in order to stop them.

soup: kellyrutherford rogerjackson nancyo'dell wescraven Horror Mystery
overview: A murdering spree begins to happen again, this time its targeted toward the original Woodsboro survivors and those associated with the movie inside a movie, 'Stab 3'. Sydney must face the demons of her past to stop the killer.

movie_title: back to the future part iii
soup: leathompson jeffreyweissman thomasf.wilson robertzemeckis Adventure Comedy Sci-Fi Western
overview: The final installment of the Back to the Future trilogy finds Marty digging the trusty DeLorean out of a mineshaft and looking up Doc in the Wild West of 1885. But when their time machine breaks down, the travelers are stranded in a land of spurs. More problems arise when Doc falls for pretty schoolteacher Clara Clayton, and Marty tangles with Buford Tannen.

soup: willferrell alisonbrie craigt.nelson etancohen Comedy Crime
overview: When obscenely rich hedge-fund manager James is convicted of fraud and sentenced to a stretch in San Quentin, the judge gives him one month to get his affairs in order. Knowing that he won't survive more than a few minutes in prison on his own, James desperately turns to Darnell-- a black businessman who's never even had a parking ticket -- for help. As Darnell puts James through the wringer, both learn that they were wrong about many things, including each other.

soup: keanureeves anthonyhopkins garyoldman francisfordcoppola Fantasy Horror Romance
overview: Dracula is searching for a woman who looks like his long dead wife.

soup: merylstreep marylynnrajskub vanessaferlito noraephron Biography Drama Romance
overview: Julia Child and Julie Powell – both of whom wrote memoirs – find their lives intertwined. Though separated by time and space, both women are at loose ends... until they discover that with the right combination of passion, fearlessness and butter, anything is possible.

soup: harrisonford christophermeloni nicolebeharie brianhelgeland Biography Drama Sport
overview: The powerful story of Jackie Robinson, the legendary baseball player who broke Major League Baseball’s color barrier when he joined the roster of the Brooklyn Dodgers. The film follows the innovative Dodgers’ general manager Branch Rickey, the MLB executive who first signed Robinson to the minors and then helped to bring him up to the show.

soup: philipseymourhoffman mattdamon jackdavenport anthonyminghella Crime Drama Thriller
overview: Tom Ripley is a calculating young man who believes it's better to be a fake somebody than a real nobody. Opportunity knocks in the form of a wealthy U.S. shipbuilder who hires Tom to travel to Italy to bring back his playboy son, Dickie. Ripley worms his way into the idyllic lives of Dickie and his girlfriend, plunging into a daring scheme of duplicity, lies and murder.

soup: billmurray kathleenturner robriggle bobbyfarrelly Comedy
overview: 20 years after the dimwits set out on their first adventure, they head out in search of one of their long lost children in the hope of gaining a new kidney.

soup: paulwalker brucegreenwood wendycrewson frankmarshall Adventure Drama Family
overview: In the Antarctic, after an expedition with Dr. Davis McClaren, the sled dog trainer Jerry Shepherd has to leave the polar base with his colleagues due to the proximity of a heavy snow storm. He ties his dogs to be rescued after, but the mission is called-off and the dogs are left alone at their own fortune. For six months, Jerry tries to find a sponsor for a rescue mission.

soup: robertdeniro annehathaway renerusso nancymeyers Comedy Drama
overview: A young, underappreciated intern at the ultra-hip magazine Skirt must learn to deal with kissy-face phoniness, model tantrums and bulimic editors, while trying to steal the heart of a dashing British art director from the grips of a supermodel.

soup: oliviamunn nadinevelazquez brucemcgill timstory Action Comedy
overview: As his wedding day approaches, Ben heads to Miami with his soon-to-be brother-in-law James to bring down a drug dealer who's supplying the dealers of Atlanta with product.

soup: wesstudi terrykinney ericschweig michaelmann Action Adventure Drama Romance War
overview: As the English and French soldiers battle for control of the American colonies in the 18th century, the settlers and native Americans are forced to take sides. Cora and her sister Alice unwittingly walk into trouble but are reluctantly saved by Hawkeye, an orphaned settler adopted by the last of the Mohicans.

soup: bokeemwoodbine curtisarmstrong harrylennix taylorhackford Biography Drama Music
overview: Born on a sharecropping plantation in Northern Florida, Ray Charles went blind at seven. Inspired by a fiercely independent mom who insisted he make his own way, He found his calling and his gift behind a piano keyboard. Touring across the Southern musical circuit, the soulful singer gained a reputation and then exploded with worldwide fame when he pioneered couping gospel and country together.

soup: rosariodawson powersboothe jasondouglas frankmiller Crime Thriller
overview: Welcome to Sin City. This town beckons to the tough, the corrupt, the brokenhearted. Some call it dark… Hard-boiled. Then there are those who call it home — Crooked cops, sexy dames, desperate vigilantes. Some are seeking revenge, others lust after redemption, and then there are those hoping for a little of both. A universe of unlikely and reluctant heroes still trying to do the right thing in a city that refuses to care.

soup: dennisquaid edgarramírez williamhurt petetravis Crime Drama Mystery Thriller
overview: The attempted assassination of the American President is told and re-told from several different perspectives.

soup: j.k.simmons jonfavreau janecurtin johnhamburg Comedy Romance

Peter immediately sets out to rectify the situation, embarking on a series of bizarre and awkward "man-dates."

soup: jasonalexander brucemcgill susanward bobbyfarrelly Comedy Drama Fantasy Romance
overview: A shallow man falls in love with a 300 pound woman because of her "inner beauty".

soup: sallykirkland jayo.sanders cherylpenland oliverstone Drama History Thriller

soup: chloëgracemoretz nialong marisolnichols johnwhitesell Comedy Crime

soup: j.k.simmons bradpitt juliaroberts goreverbinski Adventure Comedy Crime Romance

soup: donjohnson kateupton davidthornton nickcassavetes Comedy Romance

soup: kristaallen andrewfiscella shantelvansanten davidr.ellis Horror

If all goes well, the Russians would get Rudolf Abel, the convicted spy who Donovan defended in court.

soup: joaquimdealmeida davidkeith samjaeger johnmoore Action Drama Thriller War

soup: lisaannwalter nickcannon omarbensonmiller peterchelsom Comedy Drama Romance

soup: kirstendunst denisleary robertpicardo joedante Action Adventure Comedy Family Sci-Fi
overview: When missile technology is used to enhance toy action figures, the toys soon begin to take their battle programming too seriously.

soup: michaeljaiwhite frankwelker mikohughes marka.z.dippé Action Horror

soup: matthewmcconaughey margaritalevieva francesfisher bradfurman Crime Drama Thriller

soup: kevinspacey christophwaltz lindsaysloane seananders Comedy Crime
overview: Dale, Kurt and Nick decide to start their own business but things don't go as planned because of a slick investor, prompting the trio to pull off a harebrained and misguided kidnapping scheme.

soup: brendanfraser paulscheer jonathanmorganheit calbrunker Adventure Animation Comedy Family Sci-Fi

soup: rudyyoungblood daliahernández jonathanbrewer melgibson Action Adventure Drama Thriller

soup: briandennehy debrawinger roscoeleebrowne ivanreitman Comedy Crime Romance

soup: keanureeves dylanwalsh ebonmoss-bachrach alejandroagresti Drama Fantasy Romance

soup: genarowlands deneentyler joybryant iainsoftley Horror Mystery Thriller
overview: A hospice nurse working at a spooky New Orleans plantation home finds herself entangled in a mystery involving the house's dark past.

movie_title: the odd life of timothy green
soup: jennifergarner odeyarush common peterhedges Comedy Drama Family Fantasy
overview: A childless couple bury a box in their backyard, containing all of their wishes for an infant. Soon, a child is born, though Timothy Green is not all that he appears.

soup: busyphilipps beaugarrett kevinsussman paulweiland Comedy Romance

soup: robertdowneyjr. charless.dutton bernardhill mathieukassovitz Horror Mystery Thriller

soup: bobbylee nelsonascencio jeremyowen gregmottola Adventure Comedy Sci-Fi

Fortunately, it contains the two earthlings who are most likely to rescue and harbor an alien on the run.

soup: miriammargolyes tomvirtue julenerenee annefletcher Comedy Drama
overview: An inventor and his mom hit the road together so he can sell his latest invention.

As his work turns into obsession, he drifts farther and farther away from his wife, family and simple life as a small-town PI.

soup: michaelwincott kevindillon kathleenquinlan oliverstone Biography Drama Music Musical
overview: The story of the famous and influential 1960's rock band and its lead singer and composer, Jim Morrison.

soup: jameswilcox randallpark natfaxon jakekasdan Comedy

To kick things up a notch, they decide – why not? – to make a video of themselves trying out every position in The Joy of Sex in one marathon three-hour session.  It seems like a great idea – until they discover that their most private video is no longer private.  With their reputations on the line, they know they’re just one click away from being laid bare to the world... but as their race to reclaim their video leads to a night they'll never forget, they'll find that their video will expose even more than they bargained for.

soup: adamarkin celiaweston jessejames dianekeaton Comedy Drama

soup: jeannetripplehorn burtyoung vincentpastore kellymakin Comedy Crime Romance

soup: kevinspacey haleyjoelosment angiedickinson mimileder Drama

soup: liamneeson charlizetheron sethmacfarlane sethmacfarlane Comedy Western

genres: Action Adventure Crime Fantasy Mystery Thriller
soup: jonathanwinters peterboyle johnkapelos russellmulcahy Action Adventure Crime Fantasy Mystery Thriller

Will she fade after the brief blooming of a "morning glory"?  This was Katharine Hepburn's third film, and resulted in her first Academy Award for Best Actress. The film is based on a play and was remade in 1958 as "Stage Struck", with Susan Strasberg, Christopher Plummer and Henry Fonda in the three lead roles.

soup: 50cent billduke marcjohnjefferies jimsheridan Biography Crime Drama Music

One thing leads to another and Nelson ends up living with her through a November that will change his life forever.

Instead, she must regain her faith to combat the evil that waits in a Louisiana swamp.

soup: jordimollà callumblue jesseborrego oliviermegaton Action Crime Drama Thriller

soup: mirasorvino nathanlane stevenweber irwinwinkler Drama Romance

soup: alpacino martinlandau bridgetfonda haroldbecker Drama Thriller
overview: The accidental shooting of a boy in New York leads to an investigation by the Deputy Mayor, and unexpectedly far-reaching consequences.

soup: bobbiephillips elizabethberkley robertdavi paulverhoeven Drama
overview: A young drifter named Nomi arrives in Las Vegas to become a dancer and soon sets about clawing and pushing her way to become a top showgirl.

soup: kirstendunst shirleyhenderson riptorn sofiacoppola Biography Drama History Romance

But when his cousin Ronnie causes him to take a fall for driving an illegal transport of stolen cars, a police officer named Calvin Hart is injured and Jimmy lands back in prison. In exchange for an early release, he is asked to help bring down a local crime boss named Little Junior Brown.  Jimmy remarries and attempts to renew a relationship with his child. But he is sent undercover by Detective Hart to work with Junior and infiltrate his operations. As soon as Little Junior kills an undercover federal agent with Jimmy watching, the unscrupulous district attorney and the feds further complicate his life. He must take down Junior or face the consequences.

soup: sylvesterstallone mirandarichardson laurenleesmith stephenkay Action Crime Drama Thriller

soup: naomiwatts geraldinechaplin oakleependergast j.a.bayona Drama Thriller

But the day after Christmas, the idyllic holiday turns into an incomprehensible nightmare when a terrifying roar rises from the depths of the sea, followed by a wall of black water that devours everything in its path. Though Maria and her family face their darkest hour, unexpected displays of kindness and courage ameliorate their terror.

soup: carolkane warrenbeatty isabelleadjani elainemay Action Adventure Comedy Music Thriller

soup: billmurray merylstreep helenmccrory wesanderson Adventure Animation Comedy Crime Family
overview: The Fantastic Mr. Fox bored with his current life, plans a heist against the three local farmers. The farmers, tired of sharing their chickens with the sly fox, seek revenge against him and his family.

soup: angelinajoliepitt stockardchanning jamesgammon stephenherek Comedy Romance
overview: A reporter Lanie Kerrigan interviews a psychic homeless man for a fluff piece about a football game's score. Instead he tells her that her life has no meaning and is going to end in just a few days, which sparks her to action, trying to change the pattern of her life...

soup: richardepcar michaelmckean patriciaheaton johncarpenter Comedy Romance Sci-Fi Thriller
overview: After a freak accident, an invisible yuppie runs for his life from a treacherous CIA official while trying to cope with his new life.

soup: mathieukassovitz jameldebbouze isabellenanty jean-pierrejeunet Comedy Romance

soup: mary-kateolsen bobsaget rileysmith denniegordon Comedy Crime Family Romance

soup: omarepps nialong janekrakowski charlesshyer Comedy Drama Romance

movie_title: the deep end of the ocean
soup: alexapenavega treatwilliams jonathanjackson ulugrosbard Drama

Some of the characters are played by the actual participants in this story.

soup: stockardchanning nathanlane johnlarroquette andrewbergman Biography Comedy Romance
overview: An unsuccessful over-the-top actress becomes a successful over-the-top authoress in this biography of Jacqueline Susann, the famed writer of "The Valley Of The Dolls" and other trashy novels. Facing a failing career, Susann meets a successful promoter who becomes her husband. After several failures to place her in commercials and a TV quiz show, he hits upon the idea for her to become a writer. In the pre-60's, her books were looked upon as trash and non-printable. But then the sexual revolution hit and an audience was born for her books. The story shows the hidden behind the scenes story of Susan's life, including her autistic son and her continuing bout with cancer that she hid up to her death

soup: cherylhines kenanthompson omidabtahi kirkdemicco Adventure Animation Comedy Family Sci-Fi

soup: berniemac dylanbaker tracymorgan chrisrock Comedy

soup: bradleycooper robriggle mikeepps toddphillips Comedy

Launching a frantic search for Doug, the trio perseveres through a nasty hangover to try to make it to the church on time.

soup: miketyson lynnhung kwok-kwanchan wilsonyip Action Biography Drama History
overview: When a band of brutal gangsters led by a crooked property developer make a play to take over the city, Master Ip is forced to take a stand.

soup: musewatson vernetroyer robertwagner jayroach Action Adventure Comedy Crime

soup: renerusso nickchinlund stuartwilson richarddonner Action Crime Thriller

soup: catherinedyer quintonaaron kimdickens johnleehancock Biography Drama Sport

soup: alexapenavega cheechmarin darylsabara robertrodriguez Action Adventure Comedy Family Sci-Fi

soup: leonardnimoy nichellenichols walterkoenig robertwise Adventure Mystery Sci-Fi

Students Jill, Choi, Kianna, and Fisher, who are being trained by Professor Rosa of the skill of card counting at blackjack.

soup: dylanbaker jakeweber jamesgammon tarsemsingh Horror Sci-Fi Thriller
overview: A psychotherapist journeys inside a comatose serial killer in the hopes of saving his latest victim.

movie_title: the man in the iron mask
soup: leonardodicaprio anneparillaud judithgodrèche randallwallace Action Adventure

soup: scottglenn kevinconnolly dylanwalsh randallwallace Biography Drama Family History Sport

genres: Action Adventure Animation Comedy Family Fantasy Sci-Fi

soup: robinwilliams christinetaylor mindykaling kenkwapis Comedy Romance

He ends up on the run from a corrupt police force known as 'time keepers'.

soup: ming-nawen rauljulia kylieminogue stevene.desouza Action Adventure Comedy Thriller
overview: Col. Guile and various other martial arts heroes fight against the tyranny of Dictator M. Bison and his cohorts.

soup: jasonflemyng cameronboyce julianglover alexandreaja Horror Mystery

soup: aaliyah lenaolin brucespence michaelrymer Drama Fantasy Horror

When it starts murdering drug dealers, detective-lieutenant Mike Harrigan and his police force set out to capture the creature, ignoring warnings from a mysterious government agent to stay away.

soup: billyburke jessetylerferguson josephcross gregoryhoblit Crime Drama Thriller

soup: brendanfraser sissyspacek douglassmith hughwilson Comedy Drama Romance Sci-Fi
overview: Following a bomb scare in the 1960s that locked the Webers into their bomb shelter for 35 years, Adam now ventures forth into Los Angeles to obtain food and supplies for his family, and a non-mutant wife for himself.

soup: stephenroot mikestarr georgecarlin kevinsmith Comedy Drama Romance

To bounce back, it takes a new love and the courage instilled in him by his daughter.

soup: cicelytyson chadlindberg carmenejogo robcohen Action Crime Mystery Thriller
overview: After Washington DC detective Alex Cross is told that a family member has been murdered, he vows to track down the killer. He soon discovers that she was not his first victim and that things are not what they seem.

movie_title: midnight in the garden of good and evil
soup: kevinspacey bobgunton leonrippy clinteastwood Crime Drama Mystery Thriller
overview: A visiting city reporter's assignment suddenly revolves around the murder trial of a local millionaire, whom he befriends.

soup: frankwhaley j.t.walsh paulguilfoyle dannydevito Biography Crime Drama

movie_title: the x files: i want to believe
soup: mitchpileggi callumrennie nickiaycox chriscarter Drama Mystery Sci-Fi Thriller

FBI agent Drummy arrives to ask Scully’s help in locating Fox Mulder, the fugitive former head of the X-Files division, and says they will call off its manhunt for him if he will help investigate the disappearances of several women, including young FBI agent Monica Banan.  Mulder and Scully are called back to duty by the FBI when a former priest claims to be receiving psychic visions pertaining to a kidnapped agent.

soup: annehathaway stevecoogan joannalumley tommyo'haver Comedy Family Fantasy Romance

Determined to gain control of her life and decisions, Ella sets off on a journey to find her fairy godmother who she hopes will lift the curse. soup: shannonelizabeth portiaderossi derekmears wescraven Comedy Horror

soup: josephgordon-levitt daniaramirez aasifmandvi davidkoepp Action Crime Thriller

soup: kirstendunst jonfavreau austinnichols richardloncraine Comedy Romance Sport
overview: A pro tennis player has lost his ambition and has fallen in rank to 119. Fortunately for him, he meets a young player on the women's circuit who helps him recapture his focus for Wimbledon.

soup: brendanfraser brookeshields mattprokop rogerkumble Comedy Family

soup: alexrussell caribaheine richardbrancatisano kimblerendall Action Horror Sci-Fi

His partner, Bristol, is still at large. Alvin wants only to get out of prison and start fresh with his girlfriend, Lisa, and when the Feds, led by U.S. Treasury investigator Clenteen, set him loose on a sketchy deal, he thinks his luck has changed. Alvin has his freedom and the Feds have found their bait.

soup: liamneeson alunarmstrong lysetteanthony peteryates Action Adventure Fantasy

soup: merylstreep tomcruise andrewgarfield robertredford Drama Thriller War

soup: rosannaarquette dannflorek christopherrich johnmilius Action Drama Thriller War

Frank Camparelli, to re-engage them, this disillusioned pair decide to take the war effort into their own hands with an explosive battle plan that could well get them court-martialed.

movie_title: walk hard: the dewey cox story
soup: timmeadows natfaxon mattprice jakekasdan Comedy Music
overview: Singer Dewey Cox overcomes adversity to become a musical legend.

soup: kevinspacey scottglenn jasonbehr lassehallström Drama
overview: An emotionally-beaten man with his young daughter moves to his ancestral home in Newfoundland to reclaim his life.

soup: gregorysmith ronnycox harrisyulin lesmayfield Action Western
overview: When a Midwest town learns that a corrupt railroad baron has captured the deeds to their homesteads without their knowledge, a group of young ranchers join forces to take back what is rightfully theirs. They will become the object of the biggest manhunt in the history of the Old West and, as their fame grows, so will the legend of their leader, a young outlaw by the name of Jessie James.

soup: michielhuisman jimbroadbent thomaskretschmann jean-marcvallée Biography Drama History Romance
overview: From Academy Award® winners Graham King and Martin Scorsese, along with the makers of Gosford Park and The Departed, comes the story of Queen Victoria’s early rise to power. From an object of a royal power-struggle to her romantic courtship and legendary marriage to Prince Albert, Emily Blunt (The Devil Wears Prada) gives a stunning performance as the young Victoria. Packed with drama, romance, breath-taking cinematography, lavish costumes and featuring an outstanding British cast including Jim Broadbent, Harriet Walter, Mark Strong, Paul Bettany, Miranda Richardson, and Rupert Friend, The Young Victoria has captivated British audiences, and is the film that Company magazine called “an epic British film, which will sweep you up in her remarkable story.”

soup: tomskerritt basharrahal shawndoyle dominicsena Action Crime Mystery Thriller
overview: The only U.S. Marshal assigned to Antarctica, Carrie Stetko will soon leave the harsh environment behind for good – in three days, the sun will set and the Amundsen-Scott Research Station will shut down for the long winter. When a body is discovered out on the open ice, Carrie's investigation into the continent's first homicide plunges her deep into a mystery that may cost her her own life.

soup: bradpitt tyesheridan fionashaw terrencemalick Drama Fantasy
overview: The impressionistic story of a Texas family in the 1950s. The film follows the life journey of the eldest son, Jack, through the innocence of childhood to his disillusioned adult years as he tries to reconcile a complicated relationship with his father. Jack finds himself a lost soul in the modern world, seeking answers to the origins and meaning of life while questioning the existence of faith.

soup: paulsorvino lelarochon raynicholas harktsui Action Comedy Thriller

soup: heathledger markaddy bennofürmann brianhelgeland Action Mystery Thriller

soup: juliebenz wayneknight colinsalmon lexialexander Action Crime Drama Thriller

After Russoti is left horribly disfigured by Castle, he sets out for vengeance under his new alias: Jigsaw. With the "Punisher Task Force" hot on his trail and the FBI unable to take Jigsaw in, Frank must stand up to the formidable army that Jigsaw has recruited before more of his evil deeds go unpunished.

soup: kevinzegers riptorn thomasf.wilson peterhewitt Action Adventure Family Sci-Fi

Based on Jason Lethcoe's graphic novel "Zoom's Academy for the Super Gifted".

soup: josephgordon-levitt soleymanpierini jadekindar-martin robertzemeckis Adventure Biography Drama Thriller

soup: marleyshelton leearenberg angusmacfadyen ronnyyu Action Adventure Fantasy

soup: jimbroadbent tomwilkinson juliaormond billeaugust Action Drama Sci-Fi Thriller

Scenes from the film were shot in Copenhagen and western Greenland. The film was entered into the 47th Berlin International Film Festival, where director Bille August was nominated for the Golden Bear.

soup: petercoyote gregghenry rierasmussen briandepalma Crime Drama Mystery Thriller

soup: maricelálvarez hanaabouchaib eduardfernández alejandrog.iñárritu Drama

The daughter of a masterful wizard and a sea goddess, Ponyo uses her father's magic to transform herself into a young girl and quickly falls in love with Sosuke, but the use of such powerful sorcery causes a dangerous imbalance in the world. But five months later, Joel's best laid plans are abruptly cut short when his new hometown becomes the setting for some particularly gruesome murders--murders that could only have been committed by one man: David Allen Griffin. One of Joel's most elusive and cunning nemeses, Griffin has followed his former pursuer to Chicago in order to play a sadistic game of cat and mouse. Taunting Joel with photographs of his intended victims and leaving his crime scenes meticulously free of clues in order to keep the police at bay, Griffin derives as much pleasure out of watching Joel react to every movement as watching his victims die. But when Griffin moves into Joel's inner circle, Joel must quickly find some way to stop him before someone close to him becomes the next one to die.

Her family doctor treats her concerns dismissively and suggests a psychiatrist. Eventually, an allergist tells her that she has Environmental Illness.

An elite group of specialists is urgently dispatched into the still-quarantined country to retrieve a cure by any means necessary. Shut off from the rest of the world, the unit must battle through a landscape that has become a waking nightmare.

soup: justintheroux laurenambrose joelotruglio davidwain Comedy

soup: robertduvall kyrasedgwick davidgallagher jonturteltaub Drama Fantasy Romance Sci-Fi

(Hayden Christensen), and brothers Jake (Michael Ealy) and Jesse Attica (Chris Brown) successfully complete their latest heist and lead a life of luxury while planning their next job. movie_title: big mommas: like father, like son
